commentary: green to hardik ,  six runs six runs three in a row  upper-cut over deep-third  the full array from hardik  short and climbing outside-off and he uses the pace to loft it into the crowd
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , six , hat-trick of sixes to finish the innings  hardik has played a blinder here and he walks off delighted  green goes short and outside-off , there was deep backward-point in place but it didn't matter to hardik , he went for the upper-cut and beat the fielder easily  the last over from green was always going to be targeted and hardik ensured india made the most of it

commentary: green to hardik ,  six runs six runs lofted over long-off  sublime  silky  he was sitting back , gets a full ball in the slot and just checks a drive through the line and it sails over the rope
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , six , this is why he denied the single  the confidence in hardik is just oozing at the moment  this is a tremendous shot  green misses the yorker length by a couple of inches and that is enough for hardik , he lofts it with minimal followthrough and the ball sails comfortably outside-off

commentary: green to hardik ,  six runs six runs leg-stump  leg-stump , he was sitting deep and waiting to smack it flat over the fence
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , six , geez  that ball hardly took off  as flat a six as you'd see  slower ball dug into the wicket , hardik waits on the back foot with his front leg cleared and nails the pull well beyond deep-mid-wicket

commentary: green to hardik ,  2 runs 2 runs top edge flies over the bowler and lands safe  good bouncer , hurried him and he gets a thick top edge that lands at the bowler  mark as the men run in
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , 2 runs , in the air and lands safely  short and rising , hardik moves across and tries to swat the leg-stump , the top-edge goes straight up and drops behind the bowler near mid-off , quick brace

commentary: green to hardik , no run no run length ball wide of off , 134kph , he miscues towards long-off
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , no run , on a length and outside-off , hardik drills it to long-off and denies the single  he wants to face all the balls in this over and needs a change of bat  might have damaged it with this mistimed shot

commentary: green to harshal ,  1 run 1 run outside-off , 139kph , he drives to long-on
second_commentary: green to harshal patel , 1 run , outside-off , harshal drills it straight down and it is only a single

commentary: ellis to hardik , four runs four runs delightful late cut to bring up 50 off 25  short and wide , deep-point is on square , he let it come and placed it behind point with superb timing see all photos
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , four , fifty for hardik  his second in t20is and both have come since he made his return to the team  today the platform was set and he came and unleashed himself  this is a cracking shot to reach the landmark  off-pace and fraction short , hardik just delays the bat swing to ensure that the cut goes square and not close to the sweeper

commentary: ellis to harshal ,  1 run 1 run shorter slower ball , he miscues a pull-shot to long-on on the bounce
second_commentary: nathan ellis to harshal patel , 1 run , slower short of length delivery and harshal pulls it on the bounce to long-on

commentary: ellis to hardik ,  1 run 1 run good length , chopped into the off-side
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , 1 run , off-pace delivery , hardik chops it into the cover region and he takes the single

commentary: ellis to harshal ,  1 run 1 run magnificent save from maxwell at long-on  lofted powerfully to long-on , looks a certain six , maxwell leaps high over the rope , catches it in mid air , flicks it back , lands outside the rope without the ball but saves five runs  poetry in motion see all photos
second_commentary: nathan ellis to harshal patel , 1 run , brilliance by maxi  he  saved five runs for his team  slower ball and harshal picked it right out of the hand , lofts through the line and stands there admiring the shot , but maxi jumps high and catches it with both hands , releases the ball before he hits the ground beyond the rope

commentary: ellis to harshal , four runs four runs creamed through cover  a wide half volley and harshal climbs in first ball smashing it through the gap
second_commentary: nathan ellis to harshal patel , four , whoa  stand and deliver stuff  width outside-off and harshal dismisses the drive from his presence , he thumps it between extra-cover and mid-off  no need to run for that

commentary: ellis to karthik , out out huge lbw appeal turned down  australia review  full and straight , dk was trying to whip square  no bat involved  was it tailing past leg? he was very deep in the crease  ball tracking says out  three reds  smashing leg-stump  good review  ellis strikes again
second_commentary: nathan ellis to karthik , out lbw   excellent review from ellis  he was the only one appealing , even wade was not convinced but ellis made finch go upstairs and they have got the big wicket  karthik gets caught in the crease and the skiddy good length ball beats everything , hits the front pad and then the back right in front of the stumps , ball-tracking shows it to be smashing leg-stump  karthik lbw b nathan ellis 6 5

commentary: cummins to hardik ,  2 runs 2 runs length ball , outside-off , he smears a pull to deep midwicket and they run two on ellis' arm
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , 2 runs , slower ball bowled into the surface , hardik pulls it in front of square and karthik races back for the second

commentary: cummins to hardik , four runs four runs lofted over mid off  a full toss outside-off , mid off is up , he chips this inside out with control to find the rope again see all photos
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , four , another shot that  not off the middle but enough to trickle into the rope  low full toss and hardik miscues the loft over mid-off  very hard to get under these deliveries and hardik did well to get enough timing to clear smith inside the ring

commentary: cummins to karthik ,  1 run 1 run good , 138kph , middle and leg , he clips this to deep-square
second_commentary: cummins to karthik , 1 run , hard length from cummins and karthik clips it squarer this time , just a single to deep-square-leg

commentary: cummins to karthik ,  2 runs 2 runs good on off , 138kph , he  back to tuck this around the corner behind square for two
second_commentary: cummins to karthik , 2 runs , good on off , karthik tucks it behind square on the leg-side and scampers back for the second

commentary: cummins to hardik ,  1 run 1 run full and wide , he slices this off a thick-edge to wide deep-third
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , 1 run , low full toss outside-off , hardik opens the bat face and slices it to deep backward-point

commentary: cummins to hardik ,  six runs six runs crushed over square-leg  length in the slot , hardik sits deep as always and gets under it to launch it over square-leg
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , six , we have seen some massive pick-up shots today and here  one more  straighter line trying to cramp hardik but he  waiting with his front leg out of the way , whips it with a strong bottom hand and sends it over deep-mid-wicket

commentary: hazlewood to hardik ,  1 run 1 run good length , he sits deep and pulls it to deep midwicket
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , 1 run , off-pace delivery and hardik waits to pull it to deep-mid-wicket , settles with a single and retains strike

commentary: hazlewood to hardik , four runs four runs drilled straight  low full toss and he hits a bullet through hazlewood  legs and it races to the rope
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , four , ufff  that  drilled straight down the ground and hardik does not even bother to run  low full toss and he brings the bottom hand into play , whip drives it past hazlewood and the ball races to the fence

commentary: hazlewood to hardik , no run no run yorker on middle , he gets in a tangle but digs it out well
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , no run , right in the blockhole , hardik jams it onto the pad and the ball rolls back to hazlewood

commentary: hazlewood to hardik , four runs four runs thick-edge off the toe to third  third is up  it was a wide full length , he threw the bat at it and gets it off the toe and it runs away
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , four , streaky once again but hardik won't mind it  very full delivery and hardik went chasing outside-off , it was so far that he toe-ended the drive to the right of short-third-man

commentary: hazlewood to karthik ,  1 run 1 run 137kph , good length fourth stump , he opens the bat face and glides to deep-third
second_commentary: hazlewood to karthik , 1 run , good around off , karthik is happy to open the face and run it down to third-man

commentary: hazlewood to karthik ,  1 run 1 run 137kph , good length fourth stump , he opens the bat face and glides to deep-third
second_commentary: hazlewood to karthik , wide , strays down leg , karthik gets inside the line and fails to connect with the glance , wide called

commentary: hazlewood to karthik , 1 wide 1 wide angled down leg and called wide
second_commentary: hazlewood to karthik , 1 run , good around off , karthik is happy to open the face and run it down to third-man

commentary: hazlewood to karthik , 1 wide 1 wide angled down leg and called wide
second_commentary: hazlewood to karthik , wide , strays down leg , karthik gets inside the line and fails to connect with the glance , wide called

commentary: hazlewood to hardik ,  1 run 1 run 137kph , top of middle , he whips this nicely to deep midwicket but only gets one
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , 1 run , hard length and right at the body , hardik flicks it to deep-mid-wicket and settles with a single

commentary: ellis to karthik ,  2 runs 2 runs 130kph , full and slanting into leg , he tucks this neatly behind square into the gap for two
second_commentary: nathan ellis to karthik , 2 runs , full delivery angled into the pads , karthik flicks it behind square on the leg-side and gets off the mark with a brace

commentary: ellis to axar patel , out out slower ball forces the error  holes out to long-off  brilliant bowling  back of the hand slower ball wide of off , axar tries to loft over cover but miscues and skies it high to long-off  easy catch for green see all photos
second_commentary: nathan ellis to axar , out caught by green   ellis has been superb today  second wicket for him and he has taken a couple of catches as well  the back of the hand slower ball completely outfoxing axar who didn't pick it and wanted to loft over the cover region , miscues it towards long-off and green makes no mistake  india won't mind this wicket as it brings their designated finisher to the crease  axar c green b nathan ellis 6 5  [4s-1]

commentary: ellis to hardik ,  1 run 1 run 125kph slower bouncer , he adjusts late and knocks this down to short third
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , 1 run , now a slower ball dug into the surface , hardik waits and dabs it to short-third-man

commentary: ellis to hardik , no run no run good , 132kph , fourth stump , he  cramped pushing this back to the bowler
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , no run , good and no room on off , hardik knocks it back to ellis and is livid not to have at least got a single

commentary: ellis to hardik , no run no run slower ball outside-off , he gets a thick-edge along the ground and wade dives to stop it
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , no run , off-pace delivery and hardik did not pick it , he  through the drive early and the outside-edge rolls to the right of wade

commentary: ellis to hardik , four runs four runs guided fine of short third with and open face  wide worker with third up in the ring , he opens the face , gets a thick-edge but it was the intention
second_commentary: nathan ellis to hardik pandya , four , not sure it was intentional but hardik won't mind the final result  yorker outside-off , he toe-ends the drive and the ball races past inglis near short-third-man

commentary: cummins to hardik ,  1 run 1 run wide low full toss , sliced to deep backward-point
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , 1 run , low full toss outside-off , hardik opens the bat face and slices the drive to deep backward-point

commentary: cummins to hardik , four runs four runs carved over cover-point  incredible power  shorter length , he  cramped but he stands up and slaps this with extraordinary power forward of point
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , four , smashed  slower short of length delivery and hardik does not have much room to free his arms , but he still manages to slap it over the extra-cover region and the ball travels quickly to the fence

commentary: cummins to hardik , no run no run bouncer , over leg , tight call but not called wide on line or height
second_commentary: cummins to hardik pandya , no run , bouncer angled down leg , hardik gets inside the line and tries to swat it away , misses and umpire signals one for the over  cummins got away with that as it was clearly outside leg

commentary: cummins to axar patel ,  1 run 1 run 111kph , slower ball wide of off , he cuts to deep-point
second_commentary: cummins to axar , 1 run , slower and fraction short , axar waits and cuts it in front of square to sweeper cover

commentary: cummins to axar patel , four runs four runs sensational straight-drive  on the up  overpitched and he leans on a classic straight-drive
second_commentary: cummins to axar , four , shot  axar can bat mind you and he just shows his class  nothing much wrong with the delivery - fuller and close to off , axar drives on the rise and straight back past hardik  no need to run for that

commentary: cummins to axar patel , no run no run good length , 136kph , fourth stump , he mistimes a drive to midwicket
second_commentary: cummins to axar , no run , fuller and angled across , axar drives but inside halves it to mid-wicket

commentary: green to hardik , no run no run 139kph , yorker outside-off , he digs this out to cover
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , no run , nails the yorker around outside-off , hardik digs it out to cover

commentary: green to hardik , four runs four runs hammered forward of point  short and wide and he crunches this with power well infront of the sweeper who is behind point see all photos
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , four , not off the middle but in the gap , the outfield does the rest  width on offer and hardik chops the cut in front of square past cover , no chance for the sweeper to get across and stop that

commentary: green to axar patel ,  1 run 1 run good , fourth stump , he stands up and forces this to deep-point
second_commentary: green to axar , 1 run , short of length close to off , axar rides the bounce and punches it to sweeper cover

commentary: green to suryakumar , out out caught behind  extra bounce  good in the test match channel , surya tried to guide to deep-third but gets a thin-edge through to wade
second_commentary: green to suryakumar yadav , out caught by wade   massive wicket  suryakumar was starting to up the tempo and he departs attempting a cheeky shot  short of length delivery and around off , he wanted to run it down to third-man but it was too close to him , only manages an outside-edge and the ball carries nicely to wade  suryakumar yadav c wade b green 46 25  [4s-2 6s-4]

commentary: green to hardik ,  1 run 1 run top edge flies to fine-leg but just short of hazlewood  extra pace and bounce from green and he was lucky the attempted pull didn't reach fine-leg
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , 1 run , banged in halfway down , hardik takes it on and goes for the pull , the top-edge lands near fine-leg where hazlewood is happy to take it on the bounce  maybe he could have gone for the catch?

commentary: green to hardik ,  six runs six runs clubbed over midwicket  length ball , top of middle , he sits deep and smashes this high over midwicket
second_commentary: green to hardik pandya , six , make it three in a row  australia  5th bowler has to bowl couple more and hardik wants to target him  good delivery and hardik was waiting for it , short-arm jabs it over deep-mid-wicket  the amount of power he generated on that shot is ridiculous

commentary: zampa to suryakumar ,  six runs six runs and again  deep midwicket this time  zampa is furious with himself  again a delivery in the slot , he was down on one knee to send it to the moon over deep midwicket
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , six , and again  zampa continues dishing out length , and sky continues going down on it and tonking it even deeper , even higher

commentary: zampa to suryakumar ,  six runs six runs launched over long-on  84kph but a step hit  wrong length from zampa , he cleared the front leg and smashed it over long-on who watched it sail into the stands
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , six , slot ball  a rare loose delivery this from zampa in this spell , and surya piles on , with a swinging full-blooded slog , over long-on

commentary: zampa to hardik ,  1 run 1 run tossed high on off , 88kph , he drives to long-off
second_commentary: zampa to hardik pandya , 1 run , very loopy , and dipping in the blockhole  pandya unwinds from deep in the crease , and whips it to long-off

commentary: zampa to suryakumar ,  1 run 1 run 96kph , fired into leg , he whips to deep midwicket
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , 1 run , full , leg-lined , surya bottom-hands it to deep-mid-wicket

commentary: zampa to hardik ,  1 run 1 run tossed up on off , 88kph , he drives to long-off
second_commentary: zampa to hardik pandya , 1 run , full , on off , pushed off the front foot , through the covers

commentary: zampa to suryakumar ,  1 run 1 run 92kph , leg break drifting into leg , he glances to short fine
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , 1 run , drifting in on leg-stump  sky walks , flicks , along the ground , to deep-mid-wicket

commentary: hazlewood to hardik , no run no run good on off , he  cramped , cutting to backward-point
second_commentary: hazlewood to hardik pandya , no run , massive in-jagger , and it has pandya hopping as he stabs it from nearly his stomach-line to point

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , out out straight to deep-square  angled into leg , he tries to pick this up off the pads and deposit over deep-square but can't get the elevation or the length and ellis takes the catch easily on the rope
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , out caught by nathan ellis   whips it off his legs , and whips it uppishly , but in the process holes out to deep-square-leg  rahul seemed to lose his shape a bit after the drinks break , and this him losing it again , going too hard , without finding the middle  it was the knuckle ball from hazlewood and hence rahul could not get the power behind the shot  rahul c nathan ellis b hazlewood 55 35  [4s-4 6s-3]

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , four runs four runs nearly holes out but maxwell can't get there  this was smeared flat to wide long-on , maxwell dives full length to try and take it and it half volleys short of him and gets through him for four
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , four , nearly holed out  maxwell does stunningly at long-on , going for the catch after running to his right , but the ball dies right in front of him , and bounces past his hands to trickle away into the boundary  kl had a heave at this , which was nowhere off the middle

commentary: hazlewood to suryakumar ,  1 run 1 run drives and gets a thick inside-edge that runs to deep-square-leg
second_commentary: hazlewood to suryakumar yadav , 1 run , looks to drive , but gets a big inside-edge running away to deep-square-leg

commentary: zampa to suryakumar , four runs four runs shovelled away between wide long-on and deep midwicket  not sure if this was the wrong'un , sliding into middle and leg , whipped away
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , four , all swag , no sweat  surya , as if it is all very normal , whips this with a full flourish from middle-stump , against the spin , through mid-wicket

commentary: zampa to rahul ,  1 run 1 run rahul collapses his back leg and drives a full ball on middle through extra-cover
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , 1 run , flight , full , drifting in on middle  rahul clears out his front leg and pushes it quietly through the covers after leaning in

commentary: zampa to rahul ,  1 run 1 run rahul collapses his back leg and drives a full ball on middle through extra-cover
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , wide , the slider , quick , flat , going down leg  rahul swipes , but the ball skids under

commentary: zampa to rahul , 1 wide 1 wide fired down the leg-side for a wide
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , 1 run , flight , full , drifting in on middle  rahul clears out his front leg and pushes it quietly through the covers after leaning in

commentary: zampa to rahul , 1 wide 1 wide fired down the leg-side for a wide
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , wide , the slider , quick , flat , going down leg  rahul swipes , but the ball skids under

commentary: zampa to suryakumar ,  1 run 1 run darted outside-off , slashed away to backward-point , where green , i think , puts in a sprawling save
second_commentary: zampa to suryakumar yadav , 1 run , googly , but wide outside-off and pretty short too  stabbed to a diving backward-point in the ring

commentary: zampa to rahul ,  1 run 1 run flighted outside-off and breaks away , rahul has a crack at it and slices it away towards sweeper cover
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , 1 run , a loopy wide toss up , carved to deep-point

commentary: cummins to suryakumar , no run no run cummins shifts to a fuller length and targets the stumps , pushed to mid-off
second_commentary: cummins to suryakumar yadav , no run , fuller , on off , crisply punched off the front foot to mid-off

commentary: cummins to suryakumar ,  six runs six runs this is even better from surya  short and outside-off , surya reads the length so very quickly and swats it over backward-square-leg in grand style
second_commentary: cummins to suryakumar yadav , six , wow , wow  135kph , and suryakumar  read cummins  mind here , knowing he'd go a bit short , to walk inside the line premeditatedly , and swat it uppishly over fine-leg

commentary: cummins to suryakumar , no run no run cummins drags his length back and aims for the top of off , surya pats it to mid-off
second_commentary: cummins to suryakumar yadav , no run , 137 3kph , length , on off , but the ball sticks a bit in the pitch as surya checks his push to cover

commentary: cummins to suryakumar , four runs four runs regal shot from surya  slightly overpitched and outside-off , punchily driven between mid-off and covers with a high elbow see all photos
second_commentary: cummins to suryakumar yadav , four , 137 7kph , slight width , fractionally overcooked , and yadav walks right beside the line to flow with a full-faced stunning cover-drive

commentary: cummins to suryakumar , no run no run on a length and largely holds its line outside-off , surya gets forward and drives to mid-off
second_commentary: cummins to suryakumar yadav , no run , on a length , just outside-off , punched off the inside-half to mid-off

commentary: cummins to rahul ,  1 run 1 run full at the stumps , push-driven to mid-on for an urgent single
second_commentary: cummins to rahul , 1 run , pretty full , flicked off the toe-end , wide of mid-on

commentary: ellis to suryakumar , no run no run surya stands tall to this short ball on a fourth-stump line and punches it back to him  good start from ellis
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav , no run , 134 5kph , good , tummy-lined  yadav gets behind it and punches it off a straight bat , back to the bowler

commentary: ellis to kohli , out out ellis takes out kohli in his first over  on the fuller side of a good length and angling into off stump , kohli aims to shovel it over mid-on with his bottom hand but does not get enough elevation  straightforward catch for cam green in the infield see all photos
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , out caught by green   he  been cut short  a seven ball stay , and a pretty scratchy one at that , with the aussies really bowling well here to keep kohli quiet  and so , he looks to whip this full delivery uppishly , but alas , it  too full , and he just doesn't get under the length , ending up skewing it tamely to mid-on  the 2016 madness isn't happening tonight    kohli c green b nathan ellis 2 7

commentary: ellis to rahul ,  1 run 1 run pretty full leg-stump , whisked away straight of mid-on for a single
second_commentary: nathan ellis to rahul , 1 run , 136 3kph , good length , on middle , nudged softly back down the ground

commentary: ellis to rahul ,  2 runs 2 runs good and outside-off , slapped away behind point off an open face
second_commentary: nathan ellis to rahul , 2 runs , 136 1kph , neat stab this , opening his bat face and guiding this past a diving point

commentary: ellis to kohli ,  1 run 1 run slower ball on a hard length and moves away like a legcutter  kohli checks his shot and dabs it to deep-third
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , 1 run , a slower good delivery  109kph  kohli waits , hangs back , and dabs it to third-man

commentary: ellis to kohli ,  1 run 1 run slower ball on a hard length and moves away like a legcutter  kohli checks his shot and dabs it to deep-third
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , wide , angles in , and slips down leg  kohli will feel he  missed out here

commentary: ellis to kohli , 1 wide 1 wide full and angling down the leg-side , wide called  re-set the radar , nathan
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , 1 run , a slower good delivery  109kph  kohli waits , hangs back , and dabs it to third-man

commentary: ellis to kohli , 1 wide 1 wide full and angling down the leg-side , wide called  re-set the radar , nathan
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , wide , angles in , and slips down leg  kohli will feel he  missed out here

commentary: ellis to kohli , no run no run on a length and outside-off , pushed into the covers
second_commentary: nathan ellis to kohli , no run , length , outside-off , checked defensive push

commentary: zampa to rahul , four runs four runs tossed up on middle and breaks away , rahul decides to take this on as well  he tries to go over mid-off or cover , ends up slicing it squarer over point for four
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , four , streaky , but effective enough to ruin zampa  over here  a tossed up delivery , which rahul looks to go inside-out against , and ends up with the outside-edge slicing over point

commentary: zampa to rahul , no run no run rahul backs away outside leg , zampa chases him with a slider , which is flashed to cover-point
second_commentary: zampa to rahul , no run , makes room to try and go through the off-side infield , but drills it straight to cover

commentary: zampa to kohli ,  1 run 1 run lobbed up on the stumps , mighty full  kohli can't get under it  jammed out to mid-on
second_commentary: zampa to kohli , 1 run , very full again as it drifts in on middle-stump , just not letting kohli get under  squeezed into the leg-side

commentary: zampa to kohli , no run no run good and outside-off , kohli jabs it out
second_commentary: zampa to kohli , no run , near yorker , and kohli - despite a big bottom-handed whip - can only dig it out

commentary: zampa to kohli , no run no run shortish and outside-off , kohli goes on the back foot and punches it more or less straight to point
second_commentary: zampa to kohli , no run , flat , tight , on the stumps  a cramped punch off the back foot to cover

commentary: zampa to kohli , no run no run sliding into the pads as kohli does not meet with a flick
second_commentary: zampa to kohli , no run , leans forward to try and get a feel of the ball , but the ball slides on , going past the flick

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run no run shorter and swerves away outside-off with some extra bounce  rahul stabs away from the body and gets away with it as the ball misses the outside-edge
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run , a bit of a kick up off the deck , whizzing just over rahul  loose stab away from his body

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , four runs four runs full and nips away outside-off , rahul eyes up the leg-side and gets a leading edge that flies past the keeper  zampa at deep-third fumbles and gives up four  lax work in the deep
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , four , now , now  a rare aussie misfield , and zampa  the culprit , after the ball goes down to him at third-man off rahul  leading-edge , only to mess up

commentary: hazlewood to rohit sharma , out out ellis runs in from deep-square-leg and grabs a terrific , low catch  fuller and on off stump , rohit aims to pick it up and send it over the leg-side  skews it in the air  ellis covers a lot of ground , attacks the ball , and takes it see all photos
second_commentary: hazlewood to rohit , out caught by nathan ellis   a little too casually flicked this  rohit doesn't commit fully , as he looks to whip this good length delivery on outside-off uppishly over deep-mid-wicket  and thus , he ends up with a toe-end , getting dragged and dying in front of deep-square-leg , where ellis does really well to run in , slide under the ball , and keep his fingers under  rohit c nathan ellis b hazlewood 11 9  [4s-1 6s-1]

commentary: hazlewood to rahul ,  1 run 1 run shortish and leg-stump , rahul flicks it out to deep midwicket for one
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , 1 run , 140 1kph , sliding into the legs , quietly flicked to deep-mid-wicket

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run no run rahul manufactures room and shimmies out once again  hazlewood digs it short and gets it to shape away outside-off to beat the swinging bat
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run , 140 4kph , walks out again , and hazlewood bumps in a good delivery , going well over the swinging bat

commentary: hazlewood to rahul ,  six runs six runs rahul gets into the act now and launches hazlewood over square-leg for six  he shimmies out , picks up a shortish ball outside-off and shovel-pulls it away over great authority
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , six , yep , yep  intent alright  kl walks across his stumps , takes a step down the pitch as well , getting under the length and smoking it over cow-corner

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma , four runs four runs full and wide , rohit dashes out of the crease once again and throws his bat at ball  he carves it over the off-side infield for four  carved away over the cover-point region see all photos
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , four , 140kph , full , wide , and that one rare loose delivery  rohit throws his hands at it , carving over cover-point

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma , no run no run nice and full , straightens away past the outside-edge as rohit prods at it
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , no run , beats him now  cummins goes back to his fourth-stump spot , and gets it to nip past rohit  tentative defence

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma ,  six runs six runs clears long-leg for six  overpitched and on the pads , rohit picks it up and whips it over hazlewood for six  hazlewood runs in as opposed to standing back at the boundary and misjudges what could've been a chance
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , six , okay , that  seriously brave  sharma whips again , doesn't get it off the middle , and there  a backward-square-leg as well  just clears him   tell you what , that fielder was around ten yards inside the ropes , and had he been at the edge , he could've had rohit

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma , no run no run full inswinger from cummins  rohit has a roundhouse swipe at it and wears it on the pad , but this is heading down the leg-side
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , no run , 136 6kph , massive hoick across the line  ugly  ungainly  all he gets is an inside-edge onto his pad

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma , no run no run on a length and nibbles away outside-off , rohit plays with soft hands and steers it to point off the outer half
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , no run , 135 4kph , again , right on outside-off , and rohit defends off his bat  outside-half towards point

commentary: cummins to rohit sharma , no run no run good and angling into off , rohit gets right behind the line and plays it back to cummins
second_commentary: cummins to rohit , no run , length , stump-to-stump , accurately on the top of off  sharma shows it some respect

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run no run on a length and just a shade outside-off , rahul throws his bat at a drive and wafts it to mid-on off the inner half
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run , 141 3kph , presses forward to cover-drive , and ends up inside-halving it to mid-on

commentary: hazlewood to rahul ,  2 runs 2 runs short of a length and on the hips , clipped away to deep-square-leg
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , 2 runs , 137 8kph , a tad straighter , and glanced off the hips through square-leg , to get cut off by a diving fielder from behind square

commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run no run terrific delivery from hazlewood  in-between length , threatens to angle in , but leaves rahul in the channel  he hangs his bat inside the line and does not jab at the ball
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , no run , 138kph , jaffa this -- seam up , on a length , just outside-off , angling in and seaming away past kl  loose poke

commentary: hazlewood to rohit sharma ,  1 run 1 run rohit dashes down the track and hacks it away towards mid-on  he sprints across to the other end and gets off the mark
second_commentary: hazlewood to rohit , 1 run , oh , oh  140 3kph , on the stumps  rohit charges out , heaves , and drags it off a miscue straight to mid-on  but he isn't stopping on the single either  a direct-hit would have had him

commentary: hazlewood to rohit sharma , no run no run good length , angling in and straightens away , opens up rohit  hazlewood draws a leading edge that drops into the covers
second_commentary: hazlewood to rohit , no run , 137 2kph , tighter , good length , on middle  rohit looks to turn it to leg and closes his bat face early , with the ball then taking the leading-edge to roll away towards point

commentary: hazlewood to rahul ,  1 run 1 run nice and full , slanting into the pads , tucked away through backward-square-leg see all photos
second_commentary: hazlewood to rahul , 1 run , 138 5kph , a nice juicy , friendly , full delivery angling in leg-stump  and rahul crisply clips it to backward-square-leg
